statements: SELECT * FROM PromotionalOffers;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_pattern FROM PromotionalOffers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT offer_id, purchase_pattern, preferences FROM PromotionalOffers WHERE offer_id = 456;
SELECT preferences, customer_id FROM PromotionalOffers WHERE purchase_pattern = 'Discount';
SELECT * FROM PromotionalOffers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM PromotionalOffers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, preferences FROM PromotionalOffers WHERE purchase_pattern = 'Frequent';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_pattern FROM PromotionalOffers WHERE preferences LIKE '%discount%';
SELECT * FROM PromotionalOffers WHERE customer_id = 456 ORDER BY purchase_pattern DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_offers FROM PromotionalOffers WHERE preferences IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 2
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%' AND customer_id > 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT c.name, p.amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.amount > 1000 ORDER BY p.amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 2 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND amount < 5000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT purchase_date, amount FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT preference_type, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (2, 3);
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE preference_type = 'Notification';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT customer_id, name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100
SELECT offer_name, discount, validity_period FROM offers WHERE validity_period > '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT p.preference_category, c.name FROM preferences p JOIN customers c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id
SELECT o.offer_name, o.description, c.name FROM offers o JOIN customers c ON o.discount > 10
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT p.name, p.category, p.price FROM products p WHERE price > 100;
SELECT o.offer_id, o.customer_id, o.offer_details FROM offers o;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT p.name, p.price, o.offer_details FROM products p JOIN offers o ON p.product_id = o.product_id WHERE o.customer_id = 1;

SELECT p.category, AVG(pricing.price) AS avg_price FROM products p JOIN (SELECT product_id, price FROM purchases) pricing ON p.product_id = pricing.product_id GROUP BY p.category HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
